name: Sniper Shooting: 3D Gun Fight
description:
Get Ready for your all-time favorite Shooting Game . Aim for the Enemy and Battle evil creatures or do assassinations in Clear Vision. Or, protect your squad from above.And the fun doesn't stop there.

Fight with hundreds of shooting enemies.

Select your WEAPON OF CHOICE from an inventory of sniper rifles, assault rifles and machine guns. Locate your target, zoom in, take aim and GO FOR THE HEADSHOT.
